casebody.data:
The UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Mike POPOLA, Appellant. No. 264. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 15, 1937. David Goldstein and George A. Saden, both of Bridgeport, Conn., for appellant. Robert P. Butler, U. S. Atty., of Hartford, Conn., and Arthur T. Gorman, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New. Haven, Conn.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
